Welcome to the Recidivia Itch page! Here you can download the Early Prototype of RECIDIVIA and experience the vision for it's future.

The short demo allows gameplay of the first dungeon of the cave and features cutscenes!

Download the prototype for Windows or Mac and join on the development of Recidivia!

_______________________________________________________________

RECIDIVIA

In the ages before man, Gods and Goddess roamed the empty void and created worlds to call home. 

A Goddess wanted to create her own world, her own land of paradise where she will breathe life into humans to love as her children.

Through her spiritual servants, capsulled in statues around her world, prayers of love and worship are heard and delivered to the Goddess's ears.

These prayers are spoken by Clerics, people who were born with an exceptional connection to the Goddess' spiritual energy that linger in their world.

_______________________________________________________________

When a young Cleric, named Syl, meets Onyx, a Temple Guard, he befriends him. His newly found friendship changed everything. He begins to step outside of the teachings and laws of the Ethion temple. Everything comes to a breaking point when the Temple enforces a mandatory lockdown on the city. With the people of Ethion in the dark about Temple's panic, Onyx takes Syl out of the city. 

What is it that they're running from? What happened at the Ethion Temple?
